mn31:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
mn31:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharanti.
mn31:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena gosiṅgasālavanadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
mn31:3.2_0: Addasā kho dāyapālo bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
mn31:4.1_0: Assosi kho āyasmā anuruddho dāyapālassa bhagavatā saddhiṁ mantayamānassa.
mn31:4.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yenāyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo tenupasaṅkami;
mn31:4.5_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantañca nandiyaṁ āyasmantañca kimilaṁ etadavoca:
mn31:5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo bhagavantaṁ paccuggantvā—
mn31:5.2_0: eko bhagavato pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahesi, eko āsanaṁ paññapesi, eko pādodakaṁ upaṭṭhāpesi.
mn31:5.5_0: Tepi kho āyasmanto bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
mn31:5.6_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn31:5.8_0: “Khamanīyaṁ, bhagavā, yāpanīyaṁ, bhagavā; na ca mayaṁ, bhante, piṇḍakena kilamāmā”ti.
mn31:6.1_1: samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharathā”ti?
mn31:6.2_1: samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharāmā”ti.
mn31:6.3_1: samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharathā”ti?
mn31:7.4_1: imesu āyasmantesu mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ āvi ceva raho ca;
mn31:7.5_0: mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ āvi ceva raho ca;
mn31:7.6_0: mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ āvi ceva raho ca.
mn31:7.8_0: ‘yannūnāhaṁ sakaṁ cittaṁ nikkhipitvā imesaṁyeva āyasmantānaṁ cittassa vasena vatteyyan’ti.
mn31:7.9_1: sakaṁ cittaṁ nikkhipitvā imesaṁyeva āyasmantānaṁ cittassa vasena vattāmi.
mn31:7.16_1: imesu āyasmantesu mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ āvi ceva raho ca,
mn31:7.17_0: mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ āvi ceva raho ca,
mn31:7.18_0: mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ āvi ceva raho ca.
mn31:7.20_0: ‘yannūnāhaṁ sakaṁ cittaṁ nikkhipitvā imesaṁyeva āyasmantānaṁ cittassa vasena vatteyyan’ti.
mn31:7.21_1: sakaṁ cittaṁ nikkhipitvā imesaṁyeva āyasmantānaṁ cittassa vasena vattāmi.
mn31:7.23_1: samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharāmā”ti.
mn31:9.3_1: amhākaṁ yo paṭhamaṁ gāmato piṇḍāya paṭikkamati so āsanāni paññapeti,
mn31:9.4_1: sace hoti bhuttāvaseso sace ākaṅkhati bhuñjati,
mn31:9.4_2: no ce ākaṅkhati appaharite vā chaḍḍeti, appāṇake vā udake opilāpeti.
mn31:9.5_1: pānīyaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ paṭisāmeti, avakkārapātiṁ paṭisāmeti, bhattaggaṁ sammajjati.
mn31:9.6_0: Yo passati pānīyaghaṭaṁ vā paribhojanīyaghaṭaṁ vā vaccaghaṭaṁ vā rittaṁ tucchaṁ so upaṭṭhāpeti.
mn31:9.7_1: hatthavikārena dutiyaṁ āmantetvā hatthavilaṅghakena upaṭṭhāpema, na tveva mayaṁ, bhante, tappaccayā vācaṁ bhindāma.
mn31:10.2_1: evaṁ appamattānaṁ ātāpīnaṁ pahitattānaṁ viharantānaṁ uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
mn31:10.4_1: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāma.
mn31:10.5_1: amhākaṁ appamattānaṁ ātāpīnaṁ pahitattānaṁ viharantānaṁ uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti.
mn31:11-13.2_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā atthañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
mn31:11-13.4_1: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāma.
mn31:11-13.5_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā ayamañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti.
mn31:14.2_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā atthañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
mn31:14.4_1: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhakā ca viharāma, satā ca sampajānā,
mn31:14.4_2: sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedema, yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
mn31:14.4_3: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāma.
mn31:14.5_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā ayamañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti.
mn31:15.2_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā atthañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
mn31:15.4_1: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā,
mn31:15.4_3: adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāma.
mn31:15.5_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā ayamañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti.
mn31:16.2_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā atthañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
mn31:16.4_1: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāma.
mn31:16.5_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā ayamañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti.
mn31:17.2_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā atthañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
mn31:17.4_1: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāma …pe…
mn31:17.5_0: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāma …pe…
mn31:17.6_0: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāma.
mn31:17.7_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā ayamañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti.
mn31:18.2_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā atthañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
mn31:18.4_1: yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharāma,
mn31:18.4_2: paññāya ca no disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā.
mn31:18.5_1: vihārassa samatikkamāya etassa vihārassa paṭippassaddhiyā ayamañño uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro.
mn31:18.6_1: phāsuvihārā aññaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na samanupassāmā”ti.
mn31:18.8_0: Imamhā phāsuvihārā uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā phāsuvihāro natthī”ti.
mn31:19.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantañca anuruddhaṁ āyasmantañca nandiyaṁ āyasmantañca kimilaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
mn31:20.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo bhagavantaṁ anusaṁyāyitvā tato paṭinivattitvā āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn31:20.2_0: “kiṁ nu kho mayaṁ āyasmato anuruddhassa evamārocimha:
mn31:20.3_1: yaṁ no āyasmā anuruddho bhagavato sammukhā yāva āsavānaṁ khayā pakāsetī”ti?
mn31:20.5_1: api ca me āyasmantānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
mn31:21.1_0: Atha kho dīgho parajano yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn31:21.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho dīgho parajano yakkho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn31:21.3_0: yattha tathāgato viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtā—
mn31:21.4_0: āyasmā ca anuruddho, āyasmā ca nandiyo, āyasmā ca kimilo”ti.
mn31:21.5_0: Dīghassa parajanassa yakkhassa saddaṁ sutvā bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ:
mn31:21.7_0: yattha tathāgato viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtā—
mn31:21.8_0: āyasmā ca anuruddho, āyasmā ca nandiyo, āyasmā ca kimilo”ti.
mn31:21.9_0: Bhummānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā …pe…
mn31:21.17_0: yattha tathāgato viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtā—
mn31:21.18_0: āyasmā ca anuruddho, āyasmā ca nandiyo, āyasmā ca kimilo”ti.
mn31:21.19_0: Itiha te āyasmanto tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā viditā ahesuṁ.
mn31:22.2_1: kulā ete tayo kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā,
mn31:22.2_2: tañcepi kulaṁ ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaṁ anussareyya,
mn31:22.3_1: kulaparivaṭṭā ete tayo kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā,
mn31:22.3_2: so cepi kulaparivaṭṭo ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya,
mn31:22.4_1: gāmā ete tayo kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā,
mn31:22.4_2: so cepi gāmo ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya,
mn31:22.5_1: nigamā ete tayo kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā,
mn31:22.5_2: so cepi nigamo ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya,
mn31:22.6_1: nagarā ete tayo kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā,
mn31:22.6_2: tañcepi nagaraṁ ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaṁ anussareyya,
mn31:22.7_1: janapadā ete tayo kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā,
mn31:22.7_2: so cepi janapado ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya,
mn31:22.8_1: khattiyā ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittā anussareyyuṁ,
mn31:22.11_1: suddā ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittā anussareyyuṁ,
mn31:22.12_1: loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittā anussareyya,
mn31:22.12_2: sadevakassapāssa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāya.
mn31:22.13_1: yāva ete tayo kulaputtā bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya,
mn31:22.15_0: Attamano dīgho parajano yakkho bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
